Vulnerabilities.Title: Linux kernel - Sequoia - fs/seq_file.c - seq_read integer overflow
Vulnerabilities.Description: An integer overflow was discovered in fs/seq_file.c in the Linux kernel. This can lead to a buffer overflow and potential code execution.

Vulnerabilities.Title: OpenSSL - OPENSSL_LH_flush() infinite loop
Vulnerabilities.Description: In OpenSSL 1.1.1 an attacker may cause a DoS attack by crafted SSL objects.

Vulnerabilities.Title: lz4 - frame.c - integer overflow
Vulnerabilities.Description: An integer overflow was found in the LZ4 library. This could lead to a buffer overflow.

Vulnerabilities.Title: urllib3 - retries list can be mutated before being checked
Vulnerabilities.Description: The urllib3 library before version 1.26.5 contains a vulnerability that could allow an attacker to modify the retries list.
